dct_title_s: The variation of the compass for the year 1910
dct_alternative_sm: Lines of the equal annual change of the variation of the compass for the year 1910 expressed in minutes of arc
dct_description_sm: Division of Chart Construction, G.W. Littlehales, Hydrographic Engineer in charge ; U.S. Department of the Navy, Bureau of Equiment [...] ; drawn by Gr. Noetzel, Chief Lithographer and R.E.I. Borgfeldt
Shows easterly and westerly variation lines.
Verso map shows "the amounts by which the values of the variation of the compass alter from year to year and the directions in which the changes take place [...]"
